name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jira Links in a New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open all links found in Jira in new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jira Links in a New Tab will open all external links in your Jira board in a new tab. No need to remember to CMD/CTRL + click, or middle click, or right click/two-finger click to open in a new tab. We'll handle it for you :KissyMcKissyFace:
